CustomField.description: Used to hold a campaign partner member's related e-signature filed packet that is related to a NOK(Other) signer format. This works in conjunction with automation that pulls files into the button to create e-sig file to send off to clients. This is for non standard ones that have exceptions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Non Standard file for NOK (Other) Signer. A variation to the standard that requires separate considerations.
CustomField.label: Non-Standard E-Sig Packet (Other)
